property.name: description
property.value: Test composite accessor. This accessor contains two accessors, a gain and an adder. It multiplies the input by 4 and adds the result to the input. The sum is sent to the output.

property.name: input (port)
property.value: A numeric input with default value 0.

property.name: output (port)
property.value: The result of x + 4x, where x is the value of the input.
